page.title: 20RECREATION-THE CUB CAMP
page.content: The first Rogerstone cub pack went to camp in Tredegar Park.It was raining all the time.When we went to bed we got soaking because the water in the sodsheet got all over us.Also the 29th Sea Scouts went to camp.We all had a super time and being sea scouts we didn't mind getting wet.Some people said we ought to camp on the lake.Some of the ladies cooked our food which was very nice.I and my two friends did our first aid badges.We got lost and Akela found us in the middle of the camp.Then we cleaned out the stables that afternoon.The cubs had a singsong instead of a campfire because it bucketed down.We went back to our tents and had tuckshop and when we went to bed we had a midnight feast.We put sherbet in coca cola and the coke exploded!
